cards.name: Ares
cards.ability: On Reveal: Compare the Power of the top 3 cards of both decks. If your total is higher, +6 Power.

cards.name: Bruce Banner
cards.ability: When you end a turn with unspent Energy, 25% chance to HULK OUT!

cards.name: Bullseye
cards.ability: Activate: Discard all cards that cost 1 or less from your hand. Afflict that many different enemy cards with -2 Power.)

cards.name: Doctor Doom 2099
cards.ability: After each turn, add a DoomBot 2099 to a random location if you played (exactly) 1 card.

cards.name: DoomBot 2099
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your other DoomBots and Doom have +1 Power.

cards.name: Galacta
cards.ability: Each turn, the first card you play at another location reveals with +3 Power.

cards.name: Gorgon
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your opponent's cards that didn't start in their deck cost 1 more. (maximum 6)

cards.name: Ice Cube
cards.ability: At the start of each turn, get +1 Energy. Then destroy this if your side is full here.

cards.name: Iron Patriot
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a random 4, 5, or 6-Cost card to your hand. If youâ€™re winning here after next turn, give it -4 Cost.

cards.name: Lasher
cards.ability: Activate: Afflict an enemy card here with negative Power equal to this card's Power.

cards.name: Luna Snow
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add an Ice Cube to each side of this location.

cards.name: Moonstone
cards.ability: Ongoing: Has the Ongoing effects of your 1, 2, and 3-Cost cards here.

cards.name: Peni Parker
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add SP//dr to your hand. When this merges, you get +1 Energy next turn.

cards.name: Rocket and Groot
cards.ability: You can move this once. After your opponent plays a card here, steal 1 Power from it.

cards.name: SP//dr
cards.ability: On Reveal: Merge with one of your cards here. You can move that card next turn.

cards.name: Toxie Doxie
cards.ability: On Reveal: Draw a card. You can't play cards next turn.

cards.name: Victoria Hand
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your cards created in your hand have +2 Power.

locations.name: Asgard Besieged
locations.ability: After turn 3, add The Destroyer to the winning side.

locations.name: Spider Island
locations.ability: After you play a card here, move it.
